name: Eventual Hero
description:
This game was made in a little over a week for the Pippin Barr 'GAME IDEA' Game Jam

Gameplay

Tidy your apartment.

Stretch your calves.

Maybe go save the world... eventually.

Controls

[WASD] or [ARROW KEYS] to move

[SPACE] or [ENTER] to interact or stretch

[M] to mute

Feedback

You can send feedback about the game via this itch.io page

The game is free of charge, but if you enjoyed playing or reading about its development on my blog, feel free to make a donation. :)

Credits

Special thanks to Conor McCann, Pippin Barr, Aya Higuchi and the game development communities on Tumblr and Twitter.
